text: Gloucester Rugby are a rugby union club based in Gloucester, England who play in the Aviva Premiership. They are known as the 'Cherry and Whites' in reference to their traditional red and white hooped shirts. Gloucester's fiercest rivals are Bath, Bristol and Worcester with matches between the three being referred to as west country derbies. ==League position== Season League Position 2010/11 Aviva Premiership 3rd 2011/12 Aviva Premiership 9th 2012/13 Aviva Premiership 5th ===Former position=== Category:Sports competitions Category:English rugby union teams Category:Gloucester Category:1873 establishments in England
title: Gloucester Rugby
